display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: Apneas with >=5% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >=5% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp5 + hrop5 + hnrbp5 + hnrop5 + carbp5 + carop5 + canbp5 + canop5 + oarbp5 + oarop5 + oanbp5 + oanop5 ) / slpprdp
